EPISODE: S1.E1 ∙ Birth and childhood of Lord Ram
TITLE: S1.E1 ∙ Birth and childhood of Lord Ram
SUMMARY: The saga of Ramayan Gods' Prayers to Lord Vishnu King Dashrath's yagna invoking blessings for a son Birth and childhood of Shri Ram.

TITLE: S1.E2 ∙ Rama going to Gurukul
SUMMARY: Childhood of Shri Ram Thread Ceremony of Shri Ram Fundamental education imparted Shri Ram in Gurukul.

TITLE: S1.E3 ∙ Continuing Gurukul
SUMMARY: Continuation of education in Gurukul Vedanta Invocating praises to Lord Shiv Culmination of education in Gurukul.

EPISODE: S1.E4 ∙ Vishwamitra comes to Ayodhya and Ram kills Taraka Rakshasi
TITLE: S1.E4 ∙ Vishwamitra comes to Ayodhya and Ram kills Taraka Rakshasi
SUMMARY: Return To Ayodhya Vishwamitra requests King Dashrath for his son Ram to accompany him Ram slays Tadka Vishwamitra bestows divine weapons upon Ram Warfare of Ram and Lakshman with Subahu and Mareech.

TITLE: S1.E5 ∙ Ganga Redemption of Ahilya
SUMMARY: Shri Ram and Lakshman proceed to Mithila Story to the origin of the Ganga Redempion of Ahilya Shri Ram and Lakshman walk through the streets of Mithila.

TITLE: S1.E6 ∙ Ram meets Sita
SUMMARY: Janak welcomes Vishwamitra, Ram and Lakshman in Mithila, where Vishwamitra has decided to take a rest. While in there, Ram first sets eyes upon Janak's daughter, Princess Sita; in the royal garden.

TITLE: S1.E7 ∙ Sita's Swayamvara
SUMMARY: Seeking a suitable husband for his daughter, Janak holds a Swayamvar. Kings and Princes from all over come to Mithila seeking Sita's hand in marriage, yet fail to pass King Janak's test of stringing the Shiv Dhanush bow.

TITLE: S1.E8 ∙ Sita's swayamvar and Parasuram
SUMMARY: Shiv Dhanus was broken by prince Rama when he attempted to string the bow, during the swayamvara of Sita, thereby winning the princess's hand in marriage. After the marriage when his father Dasharatha was returning to Ayodhya with Rama, Parashurama obstructed their path and challenged Rama for breaking his guru Shiva's bow.

TITLE: S1.E9 ∙ Marriage Preparations
SUMMARY: King Janak sends word to Ayodhya to inform King Dasharath of the engagement of their two children. Overjoyed, the entire Ayodhya royal family come to Mithila to prepare for the wedding. After further discussion between the two royal families, it is decided that the four princes of Ayodhya will wed the four princesses of Videha.

TITLE: S1.E10 ∙ Ram and Sita's Marriage
SUMMARY: Ram and Sita are married in a grand ceremony as the whole of Mithila celebrates.

TITLE: S1.E11 ∙ Sita's arrival at Ayodhya
SUMMARY: King Janak tearfully bids farewell tho his beloved daughter Sita, as she departs for Ayodhya with her new husband and family. The four daughters-in-law are welcomed in Ayodhya.

TITLE: S1.E12 ∙ Discussion on Dasharatha's heir
SUMMARY: Vishwamitra releases Ram and Lakshman from his service and departs Ayodhya. King Dashrath decides to appoint Ram as his heir and and abdicate from the throne. While the whole of Ayodhya celebrates, Kaikeyi's maid Manthra disapproves.

TITLE: S1.E13 ∙ Rajyabhishek
SUMMARY: Celebrations mark the proclamation of Ram as heir to the throne but Manthra provokes Kaikayee into sabotaging the coronation.

TITLE: S1.E14 ∙ Kaikeyi Demands Her Boons
SUMMARY: Kaikayee demands that King Dasharath fulfill a promise he made a long time ago in the form of two boons. Unable to change her mind, Dasharath is forced to appoint Bharath as the future king while Ram exiled to the forest.

EPISODE: S1.E15 ∙ Preparing for the Journey to the Forest
TITLE: S1.E15 ∙ Preparing for the Journey to the Forest
SUMMARY: Sita and Lakshman also resolve to go to forest with Ram.

TITLE: S1.E16 ∙ Departing Ayodhya
SUMMARY: King Dasharath denounces Kaikayi as his wife and falls into a deep depression at the loss of Ram. The Grief stricken people of Ayodhya try to stop Ram from going to the forest, but ultimately fail.

TITLE: S1.E17 ∙ Meeting Nishadraj Guha
SUMMARY: Ram, Lakshman and Sita are welcomed by Guha, king of the Nishadas, who arranges for the trio to cross the river Ganga by boat.

TITLE: S1.E18 ∙ Bharadwaja's Ashram
SUMMARY: After fulfilling the condition of Khibet, Ram, Lakshman and Sita cross the Ganga and take shelter at Rishi Bhardwaja's ashram. They take leave of Guha and proceed to Chitrakoot.

TITLE: S1.E19 ∙ Valmiki's Ashram and Chitrakoot
SUMMARY: Ram, Lakshman and Sita pay a visit to Maharishi Valmiki who advises them to settle in Chitrakoot.

TITLE: S1.E20 ∙ King Dasharath's Death
SUMMARY: Sumant returns to Ayodhya alone. King Dasharath mourns the separation from his son. In depression, he dies remembering a a curse laid on him for a mistake he made in his youth.

TITLE: S1.E21 ∙ Bharath Returns to Ayodhya
SUMMARY: In Nanihal, Bharath has a strange premonition and returns to Ayodhya only to find that his father is dead and his older brother exiled.

EPISODE: S1.E22 ∙ Bharath rejects to become King
TITLE: S1.E22 ∙ Bharath rejects to become King
SUMMARY: Bharath performs King Dasharath's last rites Bharath rejects his coronation Bharath decides to crown Shri Ram in the forest and return with him.

TITLE: S1.E24 ∙ Bharat Milap
SUMMARY: Lakshman gets angry on receiving the news of Bharaths arrival in the forest. Reunion of Shri Ram and Bharath.

EPISODE: S1.E25 ∙ Bharath returns to Ayodhya with Ramas Shoes
TITLE: S1.E25 ∙ Bharath returns to Ayodhya with Ramas Shoes
SUMMARY: In Chitrakoot, King Janak conducts a meeting to plead with Shri ram to return to Ayodhya. Bharath returns to Ayodhya with Shri Rams 'Paduka'.

EPISODE: S1.E26 ∙ Ramas Shoes installed on the throne of Ayodhya
TITLE: S1.E26 ∙ Ramas Shoes installed on the throne of Ayodhya
SUMMARY: Bharath also dons the sages robe and rules Ayodhya as Shri Rams representative In Nandigram, Shri Rams Paduka is installed on the throne of Ayodhya.

EPISODE: S1.E27 ∙ Sita meets Atri & mother Anusuiya
TITLE: S1.E27 ∙ Sita meets Atri & mother Anusuiya
SUMMARY: Sita meets Atri and mother Anusuiya. Ram, Lakshman and Sita arrive at Sage Sharbhanga's ashram.

TITLE: S1.E28 ∙ Dandakaranya
SUMMARY: In Dandakaranya, seeing the bones of the sages, Shri Ram vows to take revenge on the demons Shri ram meets Sage Sutikshna Shri Ram meets Maharshi Agastya and receives divine weapons from him.

EPISODE: S1.E29 ∙ First meeting with Jatayu, Sita in Panchavadi
TITLE: S1.E29 ∙ First meeting with Jatayu, Sita in Panchavadi
SUMMARY: First meeting with Jatayu. Shri Ram, Lakshman and Sita decide to stay in Panchavati. Shurpanaka's attempt to charm Shri Ram. Lakshman cuts off Shurpanakas nose.

TITLE: S1.E30 ∙ Shurpanaka Encounter
SUMMARY: Shurpanaka provokes her brothers, Demons Khar and Dooshan. Single handed Shri Ram kills Khar and Dooshan and destroys their army. Shurpanaka laments in Ravans court.

TITLE: S1.E31 ∙ Kidnap Plan by Raavan
SUMMARY: Ravan decides to kidnap Sita. Mareech reluctantly becomes golden deer. Shri Ram, at Sitas behest, goes after the deer.

TITLE: S1.E32 ∙ Sita Haran
SUMMARY: Mareech calls out to Lakshman and Sita, mimicking Ram's voice. Sita forces Lakshman to go to Ram's aid, leaving her unguarded .Ravan seizes this chance and kidnaps Sita.

EPISODE: S1.E33 ∙ Shri Ram & Lakshman meet wounded Jatayu
TITLE: S1.E33 ∙ Shri Ram & Lakshman meet wounded Jatayu
SUMMARY: Shri Ram and Lakshman meet wounded Jatayu. In Lanka, Ravan send Sita to Ashoka Vatika.

EPISODE: S1.E34 ∙ Shri Ram & lakshman reach Shabaris ashram
TITLE: S1.E34 ∙ Shri Ram & lakshman reach Shabaris ashram
SUMMARY: In forest Shri Ram kills Khabanda. Shri Ram and lakshman reach Shabaris ashram. Shabari is overwhelmed as she meets her lord.

TITLE: S1.E35 ∙ Hanuman meets Shri Ram
SUMMARY: Sugriv notices two strangers and sends Hanuman. Hanuman recognizes Shri Ram and happily carries the two brothers to the top of the hill to Sugriv.

EPISODE: S1.E36 ∙ Friendship between Shri Ram & Sugriv Shri Ram
TITLE: S1.E36 ∙ Friendship between Shri Ram & Sugriv Shri Ram
SUMMARY: Friendship between Shri Ram and Sugriv. Shri Ram sees Sitas jewels and becomes emotional. He promises Vali for persecuting Sugriv.

EPISODE: S1.E37 ∙ Sugriv tells Shri Ram about Bali
TITLE: S1.E37 ∙ Sugriv tells Shri Ram about Bali
SUMMARY: Sugriv tells Shri Ram the cause of the misunderstanding.

TITLE: S1.E38 ∙ Ram kills Vaali
SUMMARY: Shri Ram convinces Sugriv of his strength and removes his doubts. Fight between Sugriv and Bali. Bali is killed by Shri Ram.

TITLE: S1.E39 ∙ Sugriv becomes king
SUMMARY: Sugriv is repentant and in tears. Bali consoles him and tells him that his first and foremost duty is to help Shri Ram find his consort. Tara, Bali's wife and Angad arrive. Tara falls on the ground and clasping Bali, sets up a wall of woe. Bali appeals to Shri Ram to protect Angad. Shri Ram consoles Tara and tells Sugriv and Hanuman to perform the last rites of Bali in a befitting manner. After the cremation, Shri Ram tells Lakshman to crown Sugrive. He then turns to Sugrive and says: "Go and take up the reins of the kingdom and crown Angad as the Yuvaraj."

EPISODE: S1.E40 ∙ Sugriv and Angad come to Shri Ram for his blessings
TITLE: S1.E40 ∙ Sugriv and Angad come to Shri Ram for his blessings
SUMMARY: After the coronation Sugriv and Angad come to Shri Ram for his blessings. Shri Ram suggests that the search for Sita should start after the monsoon. During the rains, Shri Ram broods over Sita's predicament and waits impatiently for the rains to stop. Meanwhile, in Kishkindha, sugriv and his household indulge in merry-making. After the rains are over, Shri Ram asks Lakshman to go and remind Sugriv of his promise.

EPISODE: S1.E41 ∙ Lakshman enters Kishikindha in a fury
TITLE: S1.E41 ∙ Lakshman enters Kishikindha in a fury
SUMMARY: Lakshman enters Kishikindha in a fury. Angad goes and informs Hanuman who requests Tara to go and allay Lakshman's wrath. Tara is able to take away the edge of Lakshman's anger and Hanuman tells Lakshman that Sugriv has already issued orders for mobilizing the warriors. Sugriv apologizes and accompanies Lakshman to pay his respects to Shri Ram. Even as Shri Ram is talking to Sugriv, great multitudes of vanaras arrive. Sugriv issues orders to send divisions of the army to the four corners of the earth. He sends Hanuman under the leadership of Angad to the south. As Hanuman touches the feet of Shri Ram, he gives him his ring and says: "I am full of hope that you will discover Sita. This ring will tell her that you are my messenger.

TITLE: S1.E42 ∙ Search for Sita
SUMMARY: Passing through a desert, fainting with hunger and thirst, Angad and others notice a cave from which birds come out with their wings wet. They conclude that there is water inside the cave. They enter the dark cave and reach a lovely grove with water and trees laden with fruits. They find Tapasvani Swamprabha, who tells them to have their fill as they have come on a noble mission. She even transports them to the sea-side by her tapes. There they meet Sampati, the older brother of Jatayu. Sampati, though old and weak, can see things very far off and tells them that Sita is in Lanka, a hundred yojan away across the sea. "But how to cross the sea?" The vanaras are worried and then Jamubant reminds Hanuman of his forgotten strength.

EPISODE: S1.E43 ∙ Jambubant reminds Hanuman of his dormant strength
TITLE: S1.E43 ∙ Jambubant reminds Hanuman of his dormant strength
SUMMARY: Jambubant reminds Hanuman of his dormant strength. Hanuman's figure begins to enlarge. From Mahendra Parbat he leaps and flies over the sea. On the way, he politely refuses Mainak's offer to rest and outwits Surasa. Suddenly he feels a mighty force dragging him down. It is Singhika who opens her mouth, thereby, drawing him in. Hanuman kills her and reaches Lanka. At the main gate he confronts Lankini, the guardian Goddess of Lanka. He defeats her, enters the city and searches high and low. Finally he learns that Sita is in Ashok Vatika.

EPISODE: S1.E44 ∙ Hanuman meets Sita in Ashok Vatika
TITLE: S1.E44 ∙ Hanuman meets Sita in Ashok Vatika
SUMMARY: In Ashok Vatika, Hanuman hides in the branches of the tree under which Sita is seated. Ravan arrives and tries his best to coax Sita to accept him. Insulted by her refusal, Ravan draws his sword 'Chandrika' when Queen Mandodari stops him.

TITLE: S1.E45 ∙ Hanuman ravages Ashok Vatika
SUMMARY: Hanuman eats the fruits of Ashok Vatika and ravages the garden. One of Ravan's sons, is killed by Hanuman. Indrajit orders his men to tie him up with strong ropes.

TITLE: S1.E46 ∙ Lanka Dahan
SUMMARY: Ravana orders Hanuman's tail to be set on fire. Hanuman then breaks his bondage and flies away. With his tail on fire he sets the whole city of Lanka ablaze. After setting fire to the whole town, Hanuman leaps away from the island and extinguishes the fire in the Indian Ocean.

EPISODE: S1.E47 ∙ Hanuman takes leave of Sita
TITLE: S1.E47 ∙ Hanuman takes leave of Sita
SUMMARY: Hanuman takes leave of Sita and goes back with her blessings. He meets Shri Ram and others, shows Sita's 'churamani' as a token, narrates his experience in Lanka.

EPISODE: S1.E48 ∙ Shri Ram meets Sugriv and his vanar Sena
TITLE: S1.E48 ∙ Shri Ram meets Sugriv and his vanar Sena
SUMMARY: Shri Ram meets Sugriv and his vanar Sena. Hanuman gives an account of Ravan's army and the security of Lanka. Shri Ram, with the permission of Sugriv, organizes the army. They march under the star of triumph 'Uttar Phalguni' towards the southern sea. They reach the seashore.

TITLE: S1.E49 ∙ Ravan summons his council
SUMMARY: Ravan summons his council. Bibhishan discusses the problem with his ministers. They advise him to take refuge at Shri Ram's feet.

TITLE: S1.E50 ∙ Bibhishan meets Shri Ram
SUMMARY: Bibhishan arrives at the camp of Shri Ram. He accepts Bibhishan as a friend and assures him the throne of Lanks.

TITLE: S1.E51 ∙ Sukh meets Sugriv
SUMMARY: Ravan discusses the matter with his courtiers and sends Sukh to seduce Sugriv from his loyalty to Shri Ram. Sugriv sends him back. Shri Ram begins to worship the Sea-God, as suggested by Bibhishan.

TITLE: S1.E52 ∙ Ram Setu bandhan
SUMMARY: Shri Ram worships Lord Shiva and seeks his blessings. monkeys, under the supervision of Nal and Neel, start working with gusto.

EPISODE: S1.E53 ∙ The construction of the bridge is completed
TITLE: S1.E53 ∙ The construction of the bridge is completed
SUMMARY: The construction of the bridge is completed and Shri Ram crosses the bridge with his army.

TITLE: S1.E54 ∙ Queen Mandodari begs Ravan
SUMMARY: Queen Mandodari begs Ravan not to fight with Shri Ram. She advises him to surrender and return Sita to Ram.

TITLE: S1.E55 ∙ Shri Ram surveys Lanka
SUMMARY: Shri Ram surveys Lanka. Sugriv leaps up as he notices Ravan on the tower of Lanka. The two wrestle. Sugrive returns to Shri Ram as Ravan resorts to magic. Ravan arranges his army, while the Vanar Sena surrounds Lanka.

TITLE: S1.E56 ∙ Army surrounds Lanka
SUMMARY: Shri Ram sends Angad as an ambassador to Ravan's court. Ravan's derogatory remarks about Shri Ram enrage Angad.

EPISODE: S1.E57 ∙ Angad tells Ravan to surrender himself
TITLE: S1.E57 ∙ Angad tells Ravan to surrender himself
SUMMARY: Ravan asks his men to capture Angad. Angad puts his foot down, challenging Ravan's men to lift it. Ravan is advised by his family members to surrender. Ravan is too proud to listen.

EPISODE: S1.E58 ∙ Queen Mandodari appeals to Ravan
TITLE: S1.E58 ∙ Queen Mandodari appeals to Ravan
SUMMARY: Queen Mandodari appeals to Ravan to listen to the advice of his elders. Angad returns. His peace mission has failed. A spy returns and announces that Ravan has spurned the advice of his well wishers.

EPISODE: S1.E60 ∙ Ravan comes to the battlefield
TITLE: S1.E60 ∙ Ravan comes to the battlefield
SUMMARY: Ravan fights with Sugriv and Lakshaman. Shri Ram confronts Ravan. Ravan returns to the palace, a broken man. Malayavan then suggest that they should awake Kumbhakarna, whose valor is proverbial.

TITLE: S1.E61 ∙ Kumbhakaran
SUMMARY: Ravan sends his men to Kumbhakaran's palace to wake him up from his deep sleep. Ravan tells Kumbhakarna that he now needed Kumbhakarna's prowess.

TITLE: S1.E62 ∙ Kumbhkarn vadh
SUMMARY: Kumbhakaran comes to the battlefield, furious. Bibhishan tries to convince him to follow the path of dharma. Kumbhakaran fights with Sugriv, Angad and others and finally with Shri Ram.

EPISODE: S1.E63 ∙ Atitkaya, Devantak, Narantak and Trishira
TITLE: S1.E63 ∙ Atitkaya, Devantak, Narantak and Trishira
SUMMARY: News of Kumbhakaran's death reaches Ravan. Indrajit wants to go to the battlefield. Hanuman and Angad kill Devantak, Narantak and Trishira.

TITLE: S1.E64 ∙ Lakshman fights with Atikaya
SUMMARY: Lakshman fights with Atikaya. Atikaya falls to the ground. Ravan almost swoons when he learns of the death of his four brave sons. Indrajit again seeks permission to go the battlefield,. Ravan hesitates, but ultimately agrees.

EPISODE: S1.E65 ∙ Ram & Lakshman Bound bu Indrajit's Nagapasha
TITLE: S1.E65 ∙ Ram & Lakshman Bound bu Indrajit's Nagapasha
SUMMARY: Lakshman fights with Indrajit. Bibhishan begs Shri Ram to help Lakshman as Indrajit's strength will increase manifold after sunset. As Shri Ram comes to the battlefield, Indrajit makes himself invisible.

TITLE: S1.E66 ∙ Ravan congratulates Indrajit
SUMMARY: Ravan congratulates Indrajit on his wonderful success. Garuda comes and the serpents flee. Shri Ram and Lakshman arise. Ravan and Indrajit are shocked to learn that Garuda freed Shri Ram and Lakshman from the serpent darts.

EPISODE: S1.E67 ∙ Laxman get injured by Indrajit's 'shakti' weapon.
TITLE: S1.E67 ∙ Laxman get injured by Indrajit's 'shakti' weapon.
SUMMARY: Indrajit hurls his Shakti baan and Lakshman falls unconscious. With Lakshman lying unconscious on his lap, Shri Ram wonders how he will face his mother Sumitra, and Lakshman's wife, Urmila.

TITLE: S1.E68 ∙ Sushen Vaidya
SUMMARY: Hanuman flies to Lanka and carries Sushen Vaidya, the royal physician on his back. Hanuman leaves in search of the herb.

TITLE: S1.E69 ∙ Sanjeevani
SUMMARY: Hanuman kills Kalnemi, reaches Dronagiri, lifts the whole peak and flies back. Hit by Bharat's arrow, he falls down in Ayodhya. Sushen Vaidya saves Lakshman with Sanjeevani her.

EPISODE: S1.E70 ∙ Indrajit goes to perform a tantrik yajna
TITLE: S1.E70 ∙ Indrajit goes to perform a tantrik yajna
SUMMARY: Indrajit goes to perform a tantrik yajna. Indrajit comes out as the yajna is disrupted. He fights with Lakshman.

TITLE: S1.E71 ∙ Indrajeet Vadh
SUMMARY: Lakshman takes out Indrastra, discharges the fatal arrow and Indrajit's head is severed. Shri Ram congratulates Lakshman and tells Hanuman to leave Indrajit's body body at the gate of Lanka with due respect.

EPISODE: S1.E72 ∙ Ravan challenges Ram and Lakshman
TITLE: S1.E72 ∙ Ravan challenges Ram and Lakshman
SUMMARY: Ravan decides to kill Sita. Maydanav holds tells him that he should go to the battlefield instead. He enters the battlefield like a whirlwind and challenges Ram and Lakshman.

TITLE: S1.E73 ∙ Ravan attacks Shri Ram
SUMMARY: Ravan attacks Shri Ram with all his pent up fury. Enraged Bibhishan, Sugriv and others attack Ravan, who becomes unconscious. His charioteer drives away from the battlefield.

EPISODE: S1.E74 ∙ Indra sends his chariot for Shri Ram
TITLE: S1.E74 ∙ Indra sends his chariot for Shri Ram
SUMMARY: Mandodari, while nursing Ravan's wounds, begs him to surrender to Shri Ram. Indra sends his chariot for Shri Ram. Shri Ram circumbulates the chariot and ascends it.

EPISODE: S1.E75 ∙ Lord Ram kills Demon Ravan
TITLE: S1.E75 ∙ Lord Ram kills Demon Ravan
SUMMARY: Vibhishana told Rama that Ravana's weakest point was in his navel. Rama with his powerful arrow shot Ravana in the navel, then Ram used Brahmastra and killed him.

TITLE: S1.E76 ∙ Agni-pariksha
SUMMARY: After Ravan's last rites are performed, Bibishan is crowned in a magnificent ceremony. Shri Ram requests Bibhishan to send Sita to the Camp. Sita arrives and undergoes agni-pariksha.

EPISODE: S1.E77 ∙ Shri Ram heads for Ayodhya
TITLE: S1.E77 ∙ Shri Ram heads for Ayodhya
SUMMARY: Brahma comes and makes obeisance to Shri Ram. Bibhishan offers his Pushpak Viman and they leave for Ayodhaya. Shri Ram stops near the ashram of Rishi Bhardwaj and sends Hanuman to inform Bharat of his arrival. As the news of Shri Ram's arrival reaches Ayodhya, the people are overjoyed.

TITLE: S1.E78 ∙ Ram Reaches Ayodhya
SUMMARY: Shri Ram reaches Ayodhya. The coronation of Shri Ram. The people sing praises of Shri Ram.
